name: Kittisaurus Kuest
description:
Funny shoot'em up game made with my cats. It's all in portuguese, doesn't have translation to english (maybe, if it has a positive feedback, I could translate it). 

By the way, the game doesn't have much text, it has only in credits, ReadMe.txt and a few in menu.

I hoje y'all enjoy playing it!

I made it with all my heart, it's my first game =D
